name: Snake 3D (itch) (AsafSharaby)
description:
Welcome to Snake 3D 

The snake dressed himself as Santa Claus on Christmas Eve, and now he needs your help to find the missing presents.

Collect the presents scattered around the map with the help of Santa's sleigh so that there will be enough for all of the world's children.

Use the special ARROWS to navigate the souvenir.

Be careful!!!

There will be obstacles in the way that will destroy the souvenir so pay attention
